attributes.additional_details: This is for attn. of David Cameron.Why on earth are you going ahead with HS2.We are already up to our necks in Debt.Why are you continuing with overseas aid,we cannot afford it,we are borrowing to pay it.Why have you cut so off MOD budget.

rejection.details: E-petitions are designed to call on the Government to take action?  Since you mention a number of projects, is your call a general one to constrain Government spending until Government debt has been reduced?  You may wish to resubmit your petition, setting out your call for debt reduction (and I suggest that H M Treasury would be a more suitable department).
